attributes.action: Establish a travel deal with allies such as France since you broke it
attributes.additional_details: I feel as though it is essential since 143,000 students from European countries in the academic year of 2018/2019 and it would be a shame for many of those students and many others to not be able to travel abroad as they wish. I also feel as though this is vital since there are many families who have half living in England and half living in a European country who can no-longer meet due to brexit meaning that many families will not be able to live together for more than 90 days
attributes.background: I would like to be able to have freedom of movement exactly like before brexit or something similar since me and many others feel as though our rights have been taken from us. I would like to be able to go and work / study and live in our neighbouring countries such as France
